entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain. High 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain late in the afternoon. Then increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning then southeast 40 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 26. Humidex 29. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low 8. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
